title: Lemon mackerel pâté
ingredients: ['2 smoked mackerel fillets, about 125 g (4½ oz) each, skinned', '200 g (7 oz) fromage frais', 'finely grated zest and juice of 1 small lemon', '2 tsp bottled soft green peppercorns, drained, rinsed and chopped, or 1 tsp dried green peppercorns, coarsely crushed', '1 tbsp finely snipped fresh chives', '1 tbsp finely chopped parsley', 'To serve', 'sprigs of parsley', 'lemon wedges']
